customCommands.description: Push a specific commit (and any preceding)

options.name: No
options.description: Do not open a Draft PR

options.name: No
options.description: Do not add SRE as a Reviewer

options.name: No
options.description: Do not add DevOps as a Reviewer

customCommands.command: git branch --merged master | grep -v '^[ *]*master$' | xargs git branch -d
customCommands.description: prune local branches that have been merged to master
Change the timestamp of the latest commit

git.branchLogCmd: git log --graph --color=always --abbrev-commit --decorate --format=format:'%C(bold blue)%h%C(reset) - %C(bold green)(%ar)%C(reset) %C(white)%s%C(reset) %C(dim white)- %an%C(reset)%C(bold yellow)%d%C(reset)' --all

prompts.title: which branch do you want to push to?

customCommands.description: Git with message generated by AI
Git with message generated by AI

customCommands.command:
{{if .SelectedCommitFile}}
git show '{{.SelectedLocalCommit.Sha}}^:{{.SelectedCommitFile.Name}}' |\
nvim -Rm - +"let b:fname = 'file git://{{.SelectedLocalCommit.Sha}}^/{{.SelectedCommitFile.Name}}'" \
{{else}}
git show '{{.SelectedLocalCommit.Sha}}' -- git show {{.SelectedCommitFilePath}} |\
nvim -Rm - +"let b:fname = 'file git://{{.SelectedLocalCommit.Sha}}/{{.SelectedCommitFilePath}}.patch'" \
{{end}}--cmd 'set mls=0' \
       +'nnoremap <buffer> q <Cmd>quit<CR>' \
       +"exec 'file '.fnameescape(b:fname) | unlet b:fname | set mls=5 | silent! filetype detect"
git fetch upstream main && git rebase upstream/main && git push --force-with-lease
git add -A && git commit --allow-empty-message -m '' && git push

customCommands.description: プルリクエストをマージ

prompts.title: Merge a pull request
prompts.body: 本当に #{{index .PromptResponses 0 }} のプルリクエストをマージしますか？
